_header: Princess of youth and flower of godlihood
Note: Skelton’s ‘Bowge of Courte’ (2477), line 253, may refer to this piece. The first five words are duplicated in line 970 of 1403 and line 897 of 1203, but there is no further resemblance.
_description: A fragmentary English song with music — one couplet

EscorIVa24.First Lines: Princesse of youth and flore of godlike dethe
